sentences.sContent: Don’t let her closet herself away in her room.
sentences.sCn: 别让她把自己关在房间里。

synos.tran: 壁橱；议事室，密室；小房间

trans.tranCn: 隐蔽的； 私下的， 秘密的

trans.tranOther: to shut someone in a room away from other people in order to discuss something private, to be alone etc
a cupboard built into the wall of a room from the floor to the ceiling
